message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds immense value, potentially far exceeding $1200000.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product right now, I'm confident it aligns with your interests.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a potentially attractive price. Please consider my offer carefully.
